titles.title: A resolution commemorating the canonization of Father Damien de Veuster, SS.CC. to sainthood.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 10/6/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the canonization of Father Damien de Veuster, SS.CC., to sainthood and honors him for his legacy, work, and service to the Hansen's disease colony on the island of Molokai, Hawaii.
